channel.title: dplyr on Angela's personal learning blog
channel.description: Recent content in dplyr on Angela's personal learning blog

item.title: dplyr tips
item.description: here I am going to put all the different things I have learned in dplyr for easy reference. more tips from Rladies, #rstats etc from twitter or just new things to me! %T>% from magrittr where you can print or some other function with pipes without breaking up your code plotly can create plot in ggplot and then put it in a call to plotly plotly::ggplotly to create interactive graphics
